description: This source file implements the FWUpgradeHAL_Stub class, providing a set of methods for firmware upgrade operations such as initialization, prerequisites setup, download, reboot, URL management, and update/reset functions. It also includes factory functions for object creation and cleanup.

classes.name: FWUPGRADEHAL
classes.description: A class providing methods for managing firmware upgrade procedures via HAL interface.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the firmware upgrade HAL module, registering the wrapper method.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up necessary pre-requisites for the firmware upgrade module.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets or cleans up pre-requisites after tests or operations.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_GetParamUlongValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves unsigned long parameters based on input JSON request.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Set_Download_Interface(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the download interface type via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Download(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Triggers firmware download process via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Reboot_Now(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Reboots the device immediately via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Get_Download_Url(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves download URL and filename via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Set_Download_Url(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the download URL and filename via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: void FWUPGRADEHAL_Update_And_FactoryReset(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs update and factory reset via HAL wrapper.

methods.name: FWUPGRADEHAL * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: Factory function to create an FWUPGRADEHAL object.

methods.name: void DestroyObject(FWUPGRADEHAL * stubobj)
methods.description: Factory function to destroy an FWUPGRADEHAL object.
